Gradient method

The iteration is as follows :

\[ \textbf{ Gradient iteration }\\ \alpha_{k} = \frac{r_{k}^{T}r_{k}}{p_{k}^{T}Ap_{k}}\\ x_{k+1} = x_{k} + \alpha_{k} p_{k} \\ r_{k+1} = r_{k} - \alpha_{k} A p_{k} \\ \beta_{k} = \frac{r_{k+1}^{T}r_{k+1}}{r_{k}^{T}r_{k}} \\ p_{k+1} = r_{k+1} + \beta_{k} p_{k} \]
